description:
While the rest of the Straw Hats prepare to set sail, Luffy gets a chance to show off his new powers in a brutal throw down between notorious pirates, navy soldiers, and deadly Pacifistas!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Que la bataille commence ! Montre-nous les fruits de ton entraînement !
Sentou Kaishi! Misero Shugyou no Seika!
The Battle Is On! Show Them What You Got from Training!
بدأت المعركة! أرهم ما اكتسبت خلال التّدريب!
戦闘開始! 見せろ修行の成果!
